<template>

  <UtilityGetFingerprint/>


  <main
  v-if="fingerprint === 'error'"
  :class="[
    'absolute',
    'w-full h-full',
    'bg-gray-200',
    'p-5'
  ]">
    <BasicText :size="'md'" :text="'WebGL disabled. Fingerprint could not be generated.'"/>
  </main>


  <main
  v-else-if="isMobile"
  :class="[
    'w-full h-full p-5',
  ]">
    <BasicText :size="'md'" :text="'This website can only be accessed through a desktop device'"/>
  </main>

  <main
  v-else-if="!isMobile"
  :class="[
    'w-full h-full',
  ]">

    <LayoutMenu />

    <router-view v-slot="{ Component }" class="">
      <component :is="Component" :key="route.path"/>
    </router-view>

  </main>



</template>

<script>

  import $ from 'jquery'

  import { useRoute } from 'vue-router'
  import LayoutMenu from '@/components/layout/LayoutMenu.vue'
  import BasicText from '@/components/basic/BasicText.vue'
  import UtilityGetFingerprint from '@/components/utilities/UtilityGetFingerprint.vue'


  export default {
    components: {
      LayoutMenu,
      UtilityGetFingerprint,
      BasicText
    },
    setup() {
      return {
        route: useRoute()
      };
    },
    data() {
      return {
        isMobile : false
      }
    },
    watch: {
      fingerprint: {
        immediate: true,
        handler(newVal, oldVal) {
          if (!$.isEmptyObject(newVal)) {
            this.postData()
          }
        },
      },
    },
    computed: {
      fingerprint() {
        return this.$store.state.fingerprint
      },
    },
    methods: {
      postData() {
        const fingerprint = this.fingerprint
        console.log(fingerprint)
        $.ajax({
            contentType: "application/json", // php://input
            dataType : "json",
            method: "POST",
            processData: false,
            // url: "http://localhost:8888/postFingerprint.php",
            url: "//thumb.kew-halle.de/postFingerprint.php",
            data: JSON.stringify(fingerprint)
        })
        .done(function(data) {
            console.log(data);
        })
        .fail(function(data) {
            console.log(data);
        });
      }
    },
    mounted() {
      var isMobile = false; //initiate as false
      // device detection
      if (window.innerWidth < 800) {
        console.log(window.innerWidth)
        this.isMobile = true;
      }

      if(/(android|bb\d+|meego).+mobile|avantgo|bada\/|blackberry|blazer|compal|elaine|fennec|hiptop|iemobile|ip(hone|od)|ipad|iris|kindle|Android|Silk|lge |maemo|midp|mmp|netfront|opera m(ob|in)i|palm( os)?|phone|p(ixi|re)\/|plucker|pocket|psp|series(4|6)0|symbian|treo|up\.(browser|link)|vodafone|wap|windows (ce|phone)|xda|xiino/i.test(navigator.userAgent)
          || /1207|6310|6590|3gso|4thp|50[1-6]i|770s|802s|a wa|abac|ac(er|oo|s\-)|ai(ko|rn)|al(av|ca|co)|amoi|an(ex|ny|yw)|aptu|ar(ch|go)|as(te|us)|attw|au(di|\-m|r |s )|avan|be(ck|ll|nq)|bi(lb|rd)|bl(ac|az)|br(e|v)w|bumb|bw\-(n|u)|c55\/|capi|ccwa|cdm\-|cell|chtm|cldc|cmd\-|co(mp|nd)|craw|da(it|ll|ng)|dbte|dc\-s|devi|dica|dmob|do(c|p)o|ds(12|\-d)|el(49|ai)|em(l2|ul)|er(ic|k0)|esl8|ez([4-7]0|os|wa|ze)|fetc|fly(\-|_)|g1 u|g560|gene|gf\-5|g\-mo|go(\.w|od)|gr(ad|un)|haie|hcit|hd\-(m|p|t)|hei\-|hi(pt|ta)|hp( i|ip)|hs\-c|ht(c(\-| |_|a|g|p|s|t)|tp)|hu(aw|tc)|i\-(20|go|ma)|i230|iac( |\-|\/)|ibro|idea|ig01|ikom|im1k|inno|ipaq|iris|ja(t|v)a|jbro|jemu|jigs|kddi|keji|kgt( |\/)|klon|kpt |kwc\-|kyo(c|k)|le(no|xi)|lg( g|\/(k|l|u)|50|54|\-[a-w])|libw|lynx|m1\-w|m3ga|m50\/|ma(te|ui|xo)|mc(01|21|ca)|m\-cr|me(rc|ri)|mi(o8|oa|ts)|mmef|mo(01|02|bi|de|do|t(\-| |o|v)|zz)|mt(50|p1|v )|mwbp|mywa|n10[0-2]|n20[2-3]|n30(0|2)|n50(0|2|5)|n7(0(0|1)|10)|ne((c|m)\-|on|tf|wf|wg|wt)|nok(6|i)|nzph|o2im|op(ti|wv)|oran|owg1|p800|pan(a|d|t)|pdxg|pg(13|\-([1-8]|c))|phil|pire|pl(ay|uc)|pn\-2|po(ck|rt|se)|prox|psio|pt\-g|qa\-a|qc(07|12|21|32|60|\-[2-7]|i\-)|qtek|r380|r600|raks|rim9|ro(ve|zo)|s55\/|sa(ge|ma|mm|ms|ny|va)|sc(01|h\-|oo|p\-)|sdk\/|se(c(\-|0|1)|47|mc|nd|ri)|sgh\-|shar|sie(\-|m)|sk\-0|sl(45|id)|sm(al|ar|b3|it|t5)|so(ft|ny)|sp(01|h\-|v\-|v )|sy(01|mb)|t2(18|50)|t6(00|10|18)|ta(gt|lk)|tcl\-|tdg\-|tel(i|m)|tim\-|t\-mo|to(pl|sh)|ts(70|m\-|m3|m5)|tx\-9|up(\.b|g1|si)|utst|v400|v750|veri|vi(rg|te)|vk(40|5[0-3]|\-v)|vm40|voda|vulc|vx(52|53|60|61|70|80|81|83|85|98)|w3c(\-| )|webc|whit|wi(g |nc|nw)|wmlb|wonu|x700|yas\-|your|zeto|zte\-/i.test(navigator.userAgent.substr(0,4))) {
          isMobile = true;
      }
      window.addEventListener('resize', ()=>{
        if (window.innerWidth < 800) {
          console.log(window.innerWidth)
          this.isMobile = true;
        } else {
          this.isMobile = false;
        }
      });

    }
  }

</script>

<style lang="scss">
  html {
    font-size: 1vw;
  }
  #app {
    @apply h-full;
  }
  body {
    @apply absolute;
    @apply h-full;
    @apply w-full;
    @apply bg-gray-300;
  }
  @media (max-width: 800px) {
    html {
      font-size: 2vw;
    }
  }
  @media print {

     html {
       -webkit-print-color-adjust: exact;
     }

     @page {
       size: 240mm 310mm;
       padding: 0;
       margin: 0mm;
    }

    .layout-nav {
      display: none;
    }
  }

</style>
